panels.description: Total operations per second across all trace endpoints
panels.title: Total Operations/sec

panels.description: Percentage of successful vs failed operations
panels.title: Success Rate

panels.description: Average latency across all trace operations
panels.title: Average Latency

panels.description: Total traces ingested per second (counting items in batches)
panels.title: Throughput (Traces/sec)

panels.description: Operations per second by operation type
panels.title: Operations Rate by Type

panels.description: Operations per second by operation type

targets.expr: sum by (http_method, operation, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_count_total{entity_type="trace", status="success", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))

panels.title: Operations Rate by Type by Workspace
Error Rate by Operation by Workspace

panels.description: P50, P95, and P99 latency for all trace operations
panels.title: Latency Percentiles (All Operations)

panels.description: P50, P95, and P99 latency for all trace operations
panels.title: Latency Percentiles by Workspace (All Operations)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (http_method, operation, le) (rate(opik_operation_duration_bucket{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (http_method, operation, le, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_duration_bucket{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])))

panels.title: P95 Latency by Operation by Workspace

panels.description: Average batch size for batch operations

targets.expr: sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_batch_size_sum{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])) / sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_batch_size_count{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average Batch Size

panels.description: Average batch size for batch operations

targets.expr: sum by (http_method, operation, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_batch_size_sum{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])) / sum by (http_method, operation, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_batch_size_count{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average Batch Size by Workspace

targets.expr: (sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_payload_size_sum{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])) / sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_payload_size_count{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))) / 1024

(sum by (http_method, operation, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_payload_size_sum{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])) / sum by (http_method, operation, workspace_name) (rate(opik_operation_payload_size_count{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))) / 1024

panels.description: Percentage of operations with attachments vs without
panels.title: Attachment Usage

panels.description: Average number of attachments per trace
panels.title: Average Attachments per Trace

targets.expr: (sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_count_total{entity_type="trace", status="error", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m])) / sum by (http_method, operation) (rate(opik_operation_count_total{entity_type="trace", workspace_name=~"$workspace"}[5m]))) * 100
